description.text: BASIC PARTICLE PHYSICS RESEARCH LEADING TO NEW AVENUES OF RESEARCH.

story.char: new technology:\n {font:smallfont.glfont}PARTICLE PHYSICS{font:tinyfont.glfont}
our experiments have led to some particularly interesting leads into NUCLEAR ENERGY, exotic TEXTILES, advanced OPTICS, and FORCEFIELDS!

description.text: BASIC BLUE-SKY CHEMISTRY RESEARCH LEADING TO NEW AVENUES OF RESEARCH.

story.char: new technology:\n {font:smallfont.glfont}CHEMISTRY{font:tinyfont.glfont}
after the unfortunate and untimely deaths in the lab of three of my colleagues, it would appear we are on to the beginnings of a new HIGH EXPLOSIVE substance, and EXOTIC TEXTILES!

description.text: ANATOMICAL RESEARCH TO PRODUCE MORE EFFECTIVE WEAPONRY AGAINST OUR ADVERSARIES.

story.char: by fine tuning the wavelengths of our blasters against alien cell biology we are now able to deal 1 HITPOINT MORE DAMAGE!

description.text: ADVANCED RESEARCH INTO ALIEN BRAIN FUNCTION AND MOTIVATION.

story.char: new technology:\n {font:smallfont.glfont}XENOPSYCHOLOGY{font:tinyfont.glfont}
our psychologists tell us that if we can figure out what makes the titans angry we may be able to LURE THEM AWAY from our valuable buildings.

description.text: ADVANCED RESEARCH INTO NUCLEAR FUSION.

story.char: new technology:\n {font:smallfont.glfont}NUCLEAR FUSION{font:tinyfont.glfont}
at last! COLD FUSION is a reality, with gigawatt power output! we must harness this new advance and design some sort of POWER STATION at once!

description.text: FUNDING TO APPLY CHEMICAL KNOWLEDGE INTO EXPLOSIVES RESEARCH.

story.char: new technology:\n {font:smallfont.glfont}EXPLOSIVES{font:tinyfont.glfont}
with yet further loss of two talented lab technicians in accidental explosions, we have developed a HIGH EXPLOSIVE substance suitable for weaponry.

description.text: USING OUR NEW KNOWLEDGE OF CHEMICAL AND PHYSICAL PROPERTIES TO RESEARCH TOUGHER MATERIALS.

story.char: new technology:\n {font:smallfont.glfont}EXOTIC TEXTILES{font:tinyfont.glfont}
advanced research into microcrystalline structures and nanoscale phase shifting will lead on to advanced BARRICADE MATERIALS.

description.text: GENERAL RESEARCH INTO SYSTEMS DESIGN FOR BETTER AUTOMATING SYSTEMS.

story.char: new technology:\n {font:smallfont.glfont}AUTOMATION{font:tinyfont.glfont}
we have pursued various avenues into better efficiency automating some of our mechanisms, leading to some further research.

description.text: SYSTEMS REQUIRED FOR THE DEVELOPMENT OF BATTLE DROIDS AND OTHER MECHANICAL AUTOMATION DEVICES.

story.char: new technology:\n {font:smallfont.glfont}ROBOTICS{font:tinyfont.glfont}
a spin-off project from AUTOMATION has led us to develop ROBOTIC SYSTEMS which we can further develop for military purposes.

description.text: NEW TECHNIQUES FOR GENERATING HIGHER PRESSURE, WIDE AREA EXPLOSIVES.

story.char: new technology:\n {font:smallfont.glfont}BAROMETRICS{font:tinyfont.glfont}
i'm afraid we have lost an entire laboratory, commander, to a gigantic explosion. but this is good news! we can do it again - to the TITANS!

description.text: RESEARCH INTO VISIBLE WAVELENGTH RADIATION FOCUS AS A PRECURSOR TO LASER DEVELOPMENT.

story.char: now that we have precision lenses we can develop HIGH POWERED LASERS and our turret VISUAL RANGE has been improved somewhat!

description.text: LABORATORY TESTING OF MEDIUM RANGE POWERED PHYSICAL PROJECTILES.

story.char: new technology:\n {font:smallfont.glfont}BALLISTICS{font:tinyfont.glfont}
we have successfully destroyed one of our own laboratories from a distance of 400 metres! but we need further refinement to the SHELL DESIGN to prevent accidents!

description.text: INVESTIGATION OF ADVANCED PHYSICAL PROPERTIES OF ELECTROMAGNETIC QUANTUM FIELDS.

story.char: new technology:\n {font:smallfont.glfont}FORCEFIELDS{font:tinyfont.glfont}
using hitherto inexplicably complex quantum mathematical theories we have proved that it should be possible to develop PHYSICAL SHIELDING using ENERGY ALONE!

description.text: ONGOING PROCESS EVALUATION TO IMPROVE REFINERY PRODUCTION WILL LEAD TO NEW RESEARCH AVENUES.

story.char: new technology:\n {font:smallfont.glfont}EFFICIENCY{font:tinyfont.glfont}
we have identified several areas for further research - in particular tuning the EXTRACTOR BEAM for refining crystals and REDUCING WASTE.

description.text: GENERAL RESEARCH INTO ALIEN ANATOMY SHOULD GIVE US SOME DIRECTION FOR DIFFERENT WEAPON DESIGNS.

story.char: we have developed a STUN capability against the ALIEN CENTRAL NERVOUS SYSTEM and our blaster weaponry is now +1 ARMOUR PIERCING!

description.text: DEVELOP TECHNIQUES TO IMPROVE THE RATE OF EXTRACTION FROM ALL REFINERIES.

story.char: good news! we have increased BEAM EXTRACTION SPEED! this will greatly help the war funding effort.

description.text: RESEARCH OF THE EXTRACTION AND REFINEMENT OF VALUABLE CRYSTAL DEPOSITS, TO FUND THE WAR EFFORT.

story.char:
[title:factory.building.spec]

 [basic:factory.building.spec] 
 output: $10 / 3 SECS
funding the war effort is key to our success! make sure you BUILD PLENTY OF REFINERIES!

description.text: DEVELOP GIGAWATT POWER SOURCES TO INCREASE BLASTER POWER

story.char:
[title:reactor.building.spec]











 [basic:reactor.building.spec]
 +1 DAMAGE
those damn boffins have come up with a COMPACT NUCLEAR FUSION REACTOR!\n\n we can use the power to INCREASE TURRET LETHALITY!

description.text: BUILDING SHIELDING RESEARCH BASED ON EARLIER FORCEFIELD WORK.

story.char:
[title:shield.building.spec]









 [basic:shield.building.spec]
 +1 ARMOUR
a miracle of QUASI-PHASIC INTERFERENCE MATRICES, the SHIELD GENERATOR will provide protection for any other buildings in range!
the materials used in construction are PARTICULARLY RARE LANTHANIDES, and the price will increase for each unit we produce.

description.text: SMALL-SCALE BATTLE DROID RESEARCH TO COMBAT SMALL-SCALE ALIEN INVADERS.

story.char:
[title:barracks.building.spec]









 [basic:barracks.building.spec]
 1 DROID / 7 SECONDS
our automated systems can now manufacture LITTLE BATTLE DROIDS armed with micro-blasters to combat targets both large and small. the factories will only be available in LIMITED QUANITITIES though.

description.text: AN EFFICIENT SECOND-TIER REFINING STAGE TO SPEED UP THE REFINING PROCESS.

story.char:
[title:collector.building.spec]










 [basic:collector.building.spec]
 +1 EXTRACTION RATE
build COLLECTORS near REFINERIES to speed up the refining process, commander.

description.text: ALIEN DISTRACTION TECHNOLOGY TO FOOL ALIENS INTO TARGETING THE WRONG LOCATIONS AND CALM THEM DOWN.

story.char:
[title:decoy.building.spec]









 [basic:decoy.building.spec]
those titans seem to be unable to resist the RYTHMIC THUMPING that these SOOTHING DECOYS make!\n\n build them as FAR AWAY from our base as possible. they are available in LIMITED QUANTITIES.

description.text: CONCRETE PRODUCTION, MOULDING AND TRANSPORT FACILITIES TO BUILD SOLID PHYSICAL DEFENCES.

story.char:
[title:concrete.building.spec]








 [basic:concrete.building.spec]
those brainboxes have developed a simple yet efffective BARRICADE!\n\n should slow the buggers down somewhat, long enough to get a few extra shots off, eh.
they tell me though that CONCRETE DOESN'T GROW ON TREES, or some such nonsense!\n\n we can only produce a few at each location.

description.text: STEEL SMELTING AND FORGING CAPABILITY ON THE KILOTON SCALE FOR STRONGER BARRICADES.

story.char:
[title:steel.building.spec]








 [basic:steel.building.spec]
this tritium enforced carbon steel barricade is 50% STRONGER than concrete. regrettably production will be limited...\n\n tritium is in fairly short supply.

description.text: TITANIUM SMELTING AND FORGING CAPABILITY FOR STRONGER BARRICADES.

story.char:
[title:titanium.building.spec]








 [basic:titanium.building.spec]
research into barricade materials continues, commander! behold our new TITANIUM BARRICADE, a third stronger than steel! alas, production is restricted.

description.text: SUB-QUANTUM DEVELOPMENT OF TITANIUM MATRICES TO PRODUCE ULTRA-STRONG DEFENCES.

story.char:
[title:nanomesh.building.spec]








 [basic:nanomesh.building.spec]
i proudly present the very pinnacle of barricade technology, NANOMESH! maximum strength, and proof against SMALL ALIENS and GHOSTS! i'm afraid we can only manufacture a few at a time though.

description.text: STRATEGICAL PASSIVE DEFENSIVE MUNITIONS RESEARCH USING XENOSENSORS AND EXPLOSIVES.

story.char:
[title:mine.building.spec]








 [basic:mine.building.spec]
triggered only by penetration of their local subspace field by a large alien presence, these MINES are completely ethical.\n\n production is limited... and be careful where you use them!

description.text: MINIATURISATION OF MINE TECHNOLOGY TO SCATTER MORE MINES PER HECTARE.

story.char:
[title:clustermine.building.spec]








 [basic:clustermine.building.spec]
although having a reduced blast area, these MULTIPLE USE explosives will also be effective against smaller ground forces.\n\n they are available in limited quantities.

description.text: REMOTE CONTROLLED DETONATION RESEARCH, WITH VERY HIGH EXPLOSIVE CHARGES.

story.char:
[title:blastmine.building.spec]








 [basic:blastmine.building.spec]
these mines are so dangerous we dared not use our normal detection mechanisms to arm them! we can't make many of then, and they must be ARMED MANUALLY by you, commander.

description.text: RESEARCH DIRECTED LIGHTNING DISCHARGE WEAPONRY TO PRECISELY TARGET NEARBY ALIENS WITH MANUAL CONTROL.

story.char: [title:capacitor.building.spec]\n\n [basic:capacitor.building.spec]
intermittently you'll need to administer your interventions specifically.\n\n employ CAPACITORS to, erm, ZAP nearby hostiles.

description.text: FIRES BLASTER ROUNDS. INEFFECTIVE AGAINST ARMOURED TARGETS.
EFFICIENCY INCREASES FOR BASIC BLASTER TECHNOLOGY TO PRODUCE ARMOUR PIERCING BLASTERS

story.char: [stats:heavyblaster.building.spec]
having a spot of bother with those wretched TOUGHER TITANS?\n\n r&d say this new turret has 50% MORE FIREPOWER, though damn those blasted boffs... LESS AMMO!

description.text: CYCLICAL BARREL TECHNOLOGY FOR BLASTERS TO DEVELOP RAPID-FIRE WEAPONRY.

story.char: [stats:multiblaster.building.spec]
a positronic coolant matrix & multiple lithium ion banks combined with a ROTATING BARREL provide this modified blaster turret with RAPID FIRE!

description.text: FURTHER REFINEMENT TO THE BLASTER TO INCREASE EFFICIENCY BY ANOTHER 100%

story.char: [stats:blastcannon.building.spec]
commander, may i present to you... the BLAST CANNON.\n\n TWICE the stopping power of a standard blaster, and it should penetrate any armour with ease.

description.text: DEVELOP STRATEGIC WEAPONRY FOR USE AGAINST FAST MOVING ALIENS IN CONFINED SPACES.

story.char: [stats:shotgun.building.spec]
the SPREADER CANNON should provide excellent stopping power against clusters of titans.\n\n it can also STUN aliens momentarily, impeding their advance.

description.text: FURTHER REFINEMENT TO THE SPREADER CANNON WITH THE AIM OF INCREASING DAMAGE, STUNNING POWER AND COVERAGE.

story.char: [stats:assault.building.spec]
by overdriving the POSITRON CAPACITORS in the ordinary SPREADER CANNON we have managed to produce a weapon over TWICE AS POWERFUL!

description.text: COMBINE OUR KNOWLEDGE OF BALLISTICS AND EXPLOSIVES TO PRODUCE A RANGED EXPLOSIVE WEAPON.

story.char: [stats:rocket.building.spec]
this ROCKET TURRET should be effective against those ARMOURED TITANS, especially if they cluster together! watch out you don't BLOW US ALL UP ACCIDENTALLY though!

description.text: APPLICATION OF OPTICAL SCIENCES INTO FOCUSED TERAWATT RADIATION WEAPONRY.

story.char: [stats:laser.building.spec]
this GAMMA RAY LASER uses POSITRONIUM ANNIHILATION to produce an intense beam capable of boring through whole columns of titans! it is ESPECIALLY EFFECTIVE against FLYING ENEMIES!

description.text: NOW WE KNOW HOW ALIEN PHYSIOLOGY WORKS WE CAN DEVELOP FORCEFIELD WEAPONRY TO DISRUPT CELL STRUCTURES.

story.char: [stats:disruptor.building.spec]
the DISRUPTOR turns the insides of alien cells into PROTOPLASMIC SLIME! unfortunately it tends also to DESTROY ANY NEARBY BUILDINGS too, making it tricky to upgrade...

description.text: BASIC ENERGY STORAGE SCIENCE TO ALLOW US TO INCREASE THE AMMUNITION CAPACITY OF WEAPONRY.

story.char:
[title:battery.building.spec]









 [basic:battery.building.spec]
 +1 TURRET AMMO
this BATTERY module augments munition storage capacity of proximate ordnance...\n\n ...it means MORE AMMO FOR TURRETS commander.
multiple batteries means EVEN MORE AMMO! \n\nturrets can SHARE BATTERIES for greater efficiency, too.

description.text: RESEARCH INTO INCREASING THE EFFICIENCY OF TURRET RELOAD PIPELINING.

story.char:
[title:autoloader.building.spec]










 [basic:autoloader.building.spec]
 +1 RELOAD SPEED
by attaching this RELOADER to TURRETS, we can speed up the reloading process significantly!

description.text: TO INCREASE THE EFFICIENCY OF OUR REFINERY EXTRACTION WE NEED TO RESEARCH QUANTUM REPROCESSING FACILITIES.

story.char:
[title:warehouse.building.spec]









 [basic:warehouse.building.spec]
 +20% MONEY
REPROCESSORS employ quantum node buckets to facilitate extraction resonance, increasing production efficiency! \n\nplace REPROCESSORS near to REFINERIES to MAKE MORE MONEY.

description.text: LONG RANGE DETECTION SYSTEMS USING RADAR AND LIDAR IMAGING TO IMPROVE EARLY ALIEN DETECTION.

story.char:
[title:scanner.building.spec]









 [basic:scanner.building.spec]
 +1 WEAPON RANGE
we have developed a new scanning technology.\n\n construct in proximity to TURRETS to INCREASE THEIR RANGE.
the more you build, the GREATER THE RANGE.\n\n turrets can SHARE scanners!

description.text: INVESTIGATE COOLING SYSTEMS TO IMPROVE TURRET FIRING RATE.

story.char:
[title:coolingtower.building.spec]









 [basic:coolingtower.building.spec]
 +1 FIRE RATE
commander, i postulate that OVERHEATING is impeding your artillery discharge rate?\n\n this cooling mechanism will enable TURRETS to FIRE MORE RAPIDLY.
once again commander, i must remind you that turrets can SHARE UPGRADES for greater efficiency.

description.text: INVESTIGATE X-RAY LASERS TO IONISE ATMOSPHERIC PATHWAYS TO FACILITATE CAPACITOR DISCHARGE RANGE.

story.char: by ionising the atmosphere prior to firing using a small laser, we can INCREASE THE RANGE of our CAPACITORS!

description.text: OPTIMISE LITHIUM CELL ARRANGEMENTS IN BATTERY TECHNOLOGY TO INCREASE GENERAL AMMUNITION CAPACITY

story.char: by carefully rearranging our battery internals we have achieved an across-the-board increase in AMMUNITION CAPACITY!

description.text: DEVELOP A REPLACEMENT TECHNOLOGY FOR WATER COOLING USING LIQUID SODIUM

story.char: by replacing old-fashioned water cooling with hi-tech LIQUID SODIUM, we have achieved BETTER COOLING for all weaponry!

description.text: REDESIGN TURRET LOADING MECHANISMS USING THE LATEST STATE-OF-THE-ART MACHINERY

story.char: a new design in the TURRET LOADING mechanism has enabled us the speed the process of reloading up in all weaponry!

description.text: FURTHER REFINEMENTS TO THE CHEMICAL FORMULA AND PROCESS FOR MAKING HIGH EXPLOSIVES

story.char: this time with the loss of only one life, we have DOUBLED THE POWER of our explosives!

description.text: RESEARCH INTO OPTIMISING PLASTIC EXPLOSIVE SHAPES TO OPTIMISE BLAST RADIUS.

story.char: we have successfully INCREASED THE BLAST RADIUS of all our explosive devices by a factor of 2, with the loss of only one coffee machine!

description.text: RESEARCH INTO THE APPLICATION OF NANOSCALE STRUCTURAL REINFORCEMENTS TO EXTERIOR STRUCTURES.

story.char: by altering and reinforcing the surface matrix structure of our building materials, we have effectively ARMOURED them against attacks!

description.text: USING OUR REPROCESSOR TECHNOLOGY, IT SHOULD BE POSSIBLE TO ACHIEVE A GENERAL REDUCTION IN WASTE FOR ALL REFINERIES.

story.char: after a particularly LATE NIGHT drinking DISTILLED COFFEE, we have designed a calibration mechanism that increases REFINERY EFFICIENCY by 10%!

description.text: THERE IS PLENTY OF ROOM HERE FOR IMPROVING THE BASIC DESIGNS OF OUR BATTLE DROID UNITS.

story.char: new technology:\n {font:smallfont.glfont}ADVANCED BATTLEDROIDS{font:tinyfont.glfont}
we have UPGRADED our battle droid hydraulics, giving them an EXTRA TURN OF SPEED, and boosted BLASTER POWER in limited quantities. they are now a LITTLE SLOWER AND MORE EXPENSIVE to produce though.

description.text: AN EXTRA DELIVERY OF COFFEE, WORTH $2500 TO THE WAR EFFORT

story.char: this EXTRA COFFEE should see us through some particularly COMPLEX EQUATIONS!

description.text: APPLY FOR A RESEARCH GRANT, WORTH $5000 TO THE WAR EFFORT.

story.char: the grant money has enabled us to obtain many EXPENSIVE INSTRUMENTS allowing us to research MORE TECHNOLOGY!

description.text: SEND FOR REINFORCEMENTS! WE URGENTLY NEED A $7500 LOAN!

story.char: earth central command has scraped together all the funds they have remaining! spend the $7500 wisely, commander!

description.text: BASIC RESEARCH INTO EXTREME MINIATURISATION.

story.char: new technology:\n {font:smallfont.glfont}NANOTECHNOLOGY{font:tinyfont.glfont}
one of our interns has produced some REMARKABLE RESEARCH on nanotechnology. we're sure it will come in useful but we're not quite sure what for yet...

description.text: OUR SCIENTISTS NEED STRONGER COFFEE IN ORDER TO WORK THROUGH SOME PARTICULARLY COMPLEX EQUATIONS.

story.char: new technology:\n {font:smallfont.glfont}STRONGER COFFEE{font:tinyfont.glfont}
thanks to the shipment of HIGH STRENGTH ESPRESSO, we have been able to work out how to fill in the RESEARCH GRANT APPLICATION FORMS!

description.text: A DEVICE TO SPLIT SINGLE LARGE BORE BLASTER ROUNDS INTO MULTIPLE BEAMS.

story.char: new technology:\n {font:smallfont.glfont}POSITRON BEAM SPLITTER{font:tinyfont.glfont}
we have developed a device that we can use to SPLIT BLASTER ROUNDS into several parts, which should come in useful for some NEW WEAPON DESIGNS.

description.text: RESEARCH INTO ULTRA-RAPID FIRE RATE WEAPONRY

story.char: new technology:\n {font:smallfont.glfont}MULTIBARREL TECHNOLOGY{font:tinyfont.glfont}
this ROTATING POSITRON LENSE should come in particularly useful in the development of new RAPID FIRING TURRETS.

description.text: WE NEED MORE EFFECTIVE WEAPONRY! THIS TECHNOLOGY PROMISES TO HELP US GENERATE THE KIND OF POWER WE NEED.

story.char: new technology:\n {font:smallfont.glfont}PHASE AMPLIFIERS{font:tinyfont.glfont}
we have now discovered an efficient technology to BOOST THE POWER of our blasters massively. we should be able to develop some REALLY POWERFUL WEAPONS with it.

description.text: DEVELOPMENT OF TERAWATT LASER SOURCES.

story.char: new technology:\n {font:smallfont.glfont}LASERS{font:tinyfont.glfont}
finally, we have cracked TERAWATT LASER technology! now we must work hard to produce an EFFECTIVE WEAPON with it!

description.text: THE DESIGN OF A LONG RANGE EXPLOSIVE SHELL FOR USE IN TURRET WEAPONRY.

story.char: new technology:\n {font:smallfont.glfont}EXPLOSIVE SHELLS{font:tinyfont.glfont}
in combination with our knowledge of BALLISTICS, we now have enough working knowledge to research a devastating ROCKET TURRET!

description.text: SOME WAY TO PROTECT OUR OWN BUILDINGS FROM THE EFFECTS OF A DISRUPTOR SHOCKWAVE

story.char: new technology:\n {font:smallfont.glfont}DISRUPTOR SHIELDING{font:tinyfont.glfont}
we can now PROTECT all of our buildings from the devastating effects of a DISRUPTOR SHOCKWAVE!

description.text: PUT IN A REQUEST TO COMMAND HQ FOR MORE BARRICADES

story.char: command hq have accepted our request for more barricades. we have increased barricade production rate by 50%!

description.text: PUT IN A REQUEST TO COMMAND HQ FOR MORE LANDMINES

story.char: command hq have accepted our request for more landmines. we have increased mine production rate by 50%!

description.text: TRY AND GET SOME SPECIAL SUPPLIES FROM THE TOP SECRET MILITARY GADGETS DEPARTMENT IN LONDON

story.char: good news, commander! my BROTHER-IN-LAW'S COUSIN works at MI5 in london back on earth, and has purloined for us a crate of ASSORTED MILITARY ASSISTIVE TECHNOLOGY!

description.text: SOME OF OUR ENEMIES ARE NOT VISIBLE USING ORDINARY WAVELENGTH SCANNERS. THIS TECHNOLOGY INVESTIGATES ALTERNATIVE SCANNING WAVELENGTHS.

story.char:
new technology:
 {font:smallfont.glfont}X-RAY SCANNERS{font:tinyfont.glfont}

-0.5 SCANNER RANGE
WRAITHS VISIBLE

by shifting the wavelengths of our scanning technology we are now able to more clearly SEE AND TARGET WRAITHS.\n\nunfortunately this has come at the expense of a loss in visual acuity in normal visible wavelengths.

description.text: DEVELOP STRATEGICAL PASSIVE DEFENSIVE GROUND COVERINGS TO IMPEDE ALIEN MOBILITY.

story.char:
[title:tangleweb.building.spec]









 [basic:tangleweb.building.spec]
by laying down this complex STICKY MATERIAL we can slow down the advancing aliens, giving us more time to BLAST THEM TO BITS!\n\n we can only manufacture tangleweb in limited quantities.

 [basic:tankfactory.building.spec]

 [basic:repairdrones.building.spec]
